title: IPL 2025 squads: Updated team lists after day one of the auction
description: Here is how all ten teams stack up after some frantic bidding on day one of the IPL 2025 auction.
author: Abhishek Mukherjee
excerpt: Here is how all ten teams stack up after some frantic bidding on day one of the IPL 2025 auction.
text: Here is how all ten teams stack up after some frantic bidding on day one of the IPL 2025 auction. Between them, the ten franchises acquired a total of 71 players for a whopping amount of INR 467.3 crores. Here is how the ten squads stack up after day one of the two-day auction of IPL 2025. IPL 2025 squads (overseas players underlined, price in INR crore) Chennai Super Kings Retained: Ruturaj Gaikwad (18), Ravindra Jadeja (18), Matheesha Pathirana (13), Shivam Dube (12), MS Dhoni (4). From auction: Noor Ahmad (10), R Ashwin (9.75), Devon Conway (6.25), Khaleel Ahmed (4.8), Rachin Ravindra (4), Rahul Tripathi (3.4), Vijay Shankar (1.2). Delhi Capitals Retained: Axar Patel (16.5), Kuldeep Yadav (13.25), Tristan Stubbs (10), Abishek Porel (4). From auction: KL Rahul (14), Mitchell Starc (11.75), T Natarajan (10.75), Jake Fraser-McGurk (9), Harry Brook (6), Ashutosh Sharma (3.8), Mohit Sharma (2.2), Sameer Rizvi (0.95), Karun Nair (0.5). Gujarat Titans Retained: Rashid Khan (18), Shubman Gill (16.5), Sai Sudharsan (8.5), Shahrukh Khan (4), Rahul Tewatia (4). From auction: Jos Buttler (15.75), Mohammed Siraj (12.25), Kagiso Rabada (10.75), Prasidh Krishna (9.5), Mahipal Lomror (1.7), Kumar Kushagra (0.65), Nishant Sindhu (0.3), Anuj Rawat (0.3), Manav Suthar (0.3). Kolkata Knight Riders Retained: Rinku Singh (13), Varun Chakravarthy (12), Andre Russell (12), Sunil Narine (12), Harshit Rana (4), Ramandeep Singh (4). From auction: Venkatesh Iyer (23.75), Anrich Nortje (6.5), Quinton de Kock (3.6), Angkrish Raghuvanshi (3), Rahmanullah Gurbaz (2), Vaibhav Arora (1.8), Mayank Markande (0.3). Lucknow Super Giants Retained: Nicholas Pooran (21), Mayank Yadav (11), Ravi Bishnoi (11), Ayush Badoni (4), Mohsin Khan (4). From auction: Rishabh Pant (27), Avesh Khan (9.75), David Miller (7.5), Abdul Samad (4.2), Mitchell Marsh (3.4), Aiden Markram (2), Aryan Juyal (0.3). Mumbai Indians Retained: Jasprit Bumrah (18), Hardik Pandya (16.35), Suryakumar Yadav (16.35), Rohit Sharma (16.3), Tilak Varma (8). From auction: Trent Boult (12.5), Naman Dhir (5.25), Robin Minz (0.65), Karn Sharma (0.5). Punjab Kings Retained: Shashank Singh (4), Prabhsimran Singh (4). From auction: Shreyas Iyer (26.75), Arshdeep Singh (18), Yuzvendra Chahal (18), Marcus Stoinis (11), Glenn Maxwell (4.2), Nehal Wadhera (4.2), Vijaykumar Vyshak (1.8), Yash Thakur (1.6), Harpreet Brar (1.5), Vishnu Vinod (0.95). Rajasthan Royals Retained: Yashasvi Jaiswal (18), Sanju Samson (18), Dhruv Jurel (14), Riyan Parag (14), Shimron Hetmyer (11), Sandeep Sharma (4). From auction: Jofra Archer (12.5), Wanindu Hasaranga (5.25), Maheesh Theeskhana (4.4), Akash Madhwal (1.2), Kumar Kartikeya (0.3). Royal Challengers Bengaluru Retained: Virat Kohli (21), Rajat Patidar (11), Yash Dayal (5). From auction: Josh Hazlewood (12.5), Phil Salt (11.5), Jitesh Sharma (11), Liam Livingstone (8.75), Rasikh Salam (8.75), Suyash Sharma (2.6). Sunrisers Hyderabad Retained: Heinrich Klaasen (23), Pat Cummins (18), Abhishek Sharma (14), Travis Head (14), Nitish Kumar Reddy (6). From auction: Ishan Kishan (11.25), Mohammed Shami (10), Harshal Patel (8), Rahul Chahar (3.2), Abhinav Manohar (3.2), Adam Zampa (2.4), Simarjeet Singh (1.5), Atharva Taide (0.3). html:
Here is how all ten teams stack up after some frantic bidding on day one of the IPL 2025 auction.

Between them, the ten franchises acquired a total of 71 players for a whopping amount of INR 467.3 crores. Here is how the ten squads stack up after day one of the two-day auction of IPL 2025.

IPL 2025 squads (overseas players underlined, price in INR crore)

Chennai Super Kings

Retained: Ruturaj Gaikwad (18), Ravindra Jadeja (18), Matheesha Pathirana (13), Shivam Dube (12), MS Dhoni (4).

From auction: Noor Ahmad (10), R Ashwin (9.75), Devon Conway (6.25), Khaleel Ahmed (4.8), Rachin Ravindra (4), Rahul Tripathi (3.4), Vijay Shankar (1.2).

Delhi Capitals

Retained: Axar Patel (16.5), Kuldeep Yadav (13.25), Tristan Stubbs (10), Abishek Porel (4).

From auction: KL Rahul (14), Mitchell Starc (11.75), T Natarajan (10.75), Jake Fraser-McGurk (9), Harry Brook (6), Ashutosh Sharma (3.8), Mohit Sharma (2.2), Sameer Rizvi (0.95), Karun Nair (0.5).

Gujarat Titans

Retained: Rashid Khan (18), Shubman Gill (16.5), Sai Sudharsan (8.5), Shahrukh Khan (4), Rahul Tewatia (4).

From auction: Jos Buttler (15.75), Mohammed Siraj (12.25), Kagiso Rabada (10.75), Prasidh Krishna (9.5), Mahipal Lomror (1.7), Kumar Kushagra (0.65), Nishant Sindhu (0.3), Anuj Rawat (0.3), Manav Suthar (0.3).

Kolkata Knight Riders

Retained: Rinku Singh (13), Varun Chakravarthy (12), Andre Russell (12), Sunil Narine (12), Harshit Rana (4), Ramandeep Singh (4).

From auction: Venkatesh Iyer (23.75), Anrich Nortje (6.5), Quinton de Kock (3.6), Angkrish Raghuvanshi (3), Rahmanullah Gurbaz (2), Vaibhav Arora (1.8), Mayank Markande (0.3).

Lucknow Super Giants

Retained: Nicholas Pooran (21), Mayank Yadav (11), Ravi Bishnoi (11), Ayush Badoni (4), Mohsin Khan (4).

From auction: Rishabh Pant (27), Avesh Khan (9.75), David Miller (7.5), Abdul Samad (4.2), Mitchell Marsh (3.4), Aiden Markram (2), Aryan Juyal (0.3).

Mumbai Indians

Retained: Jasprit Bumrah (18), Hardik Pandya (16.35), Suryakumar Yadav (16.35), Rohit Sharma (16.3), Tilak Varma (8).

From auction: Trent Boult (12.5), Naman Dhir (5.25), Robin Minz (0.65), Karn Sharma (0.5).

Punjab Kings

Retained: Shashank Singh (4), Prabhsimran Singh (4).

From auction: Shreyas Iyer (26.75), Arshdeep Singh (18), Yuzvendra Chahal (18), Marcus Stoinis (11), Glenn Maxwell (4.2), Nehal Wadhera (4.2), Vijaykumar Vyshak (1.8), Yash Thakur (1.6), Harpreet Brar (1.5), Vishnu Vinod (0.95).

Rajasthan Royals

Retained: Yashasvi Jaiswal (18), Sanju Samson (18), Dhruv Jurel (14), Riyan Parag (14), Shimron Hetmyer (11), Sandeep Sharma (4).

From auction: Jofra Archer (12.5), Wanindu Hasaranga (5.25), Maheesh Theeskhana (4.4), Akash Madhwal (1.2), Kumar Kartikeya (0.3).

Royal Challengers Bengaluru

Retained: Virat Kohli (21), Rajat Patidar (11), Yash Dayal (5).

From auction: Josh Hazlewood (12.5), Phil Salt (11.5), Jitesh Sharma (11), Liam Livingstone (8.75), Rasikh Salam (8.75), Suyash Sharma (2.6).

Sunrisers Hyderabad

Retained: Heinrich Klaasen (23), Pat Cummins (18), Abhishek Sharma (14), Travis Head (14), Nitish Kumar Reddy (6).

From auction: Ishan Kishan (11.25), Mohammed Shami (10), Harshal Patel (8), Rahul Chahar (3.2), Abhinav Manohar (3.2), Adam Zampa (2.4), Simarjeet Singh (1.5), Atharva Taide (0.3).
